name: iOSRTCApp
description: Google's AppRTC application adapted to iOS devices using cordova-plugin-iosrtc
author: IÃ±aki Baz Castillo at eFace2Face, inc.

scripts.ios-run-clean: cordova platform remove ios; cordova clean; cordova platform add ios; cordova run ios --device
scripts.android-run-clean: cordova platform remove android; cordova clean; cordova platform add android; cordova run android --device
scripts.browser-run-clean: cordova platform remove browser; cordova clean; cordova platform add browser; cordova run browser --device
